programme.title: Superman: Unbound, (2013, Animated)
programme.desc: Superman (Matt Bomer) battles Brainiac (John Noble) to save the Krypton city of Kandor, which is miniaturized and held aboard Brainiac's ship.

programme.title: The Farewell, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: Billi's family returns to China under the guise of a fake wedding to stealthily say goodbye to their beloved matriarch -- the only person that doesn't know she only has a few weeks to live.

programme.title: 3 From Hell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Crazed killers Baby Firefly, Captain Spaulding and Otis Driftwood unleash bloody mayhem after escaping from prison.

programme.title: Problemista, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Alejandro, an aspiring toy designer from El Salvador, tries to bring his fanciful ideas to life and chase his dream in New York City with the help of his erratic employer.

programme.title: The Disaster Artist, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: The incredible true story of aspiring filmmaker and Hollywood outsider Tommy Wiseau as he and his best friend defiantly pursue their dreams and embark on the hilarious odyssey of making the now-infamous, cult classic "The Room.".

programme.title: Balls Out, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fifth year college senior Caleb Fuller (Jake Lacy) gets his flag football team back together for one last shot at intramural football glory.

programme.title: The Color Purple, (2023, Musical)
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships, including an abusive husband. With support from a singer and her stepdaughter, she ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood.

programme.title: Knight and Day, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: A woman (Cameron Diaz) gets ensnared in a deadly, global adventure when she becomes the reluctant partner of a fugitive spy (Tom Cruise).

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Professor X (James McAvoy) and Raven (Jennifer Lawrence) lead a team of young X-Men to stop the immortal mutant Apocalypse (Oscar Isaac) from destroying mankind.

programme.title: The Martian, (2015, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Left behind by his crew, a stranded astronaut must find a way to survive on Mars, while NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring him home.

programme.title: D...: The Musical, (2023, Musical)
programme.desc: Two self-obsessed businessmen discover they're long-lost identical twins and come together to plot the reunion of their divorced parents.

programme.title: When the Sun Sets, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: A young nurse fears her activist brother may be in danger in apartheid South Africa.

programme.title: Shadows, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: A high school student exploring her independence on homecoming night is disrupted by her older brother and the shadows of their past.

programme.title: Dream Scenario, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: A family man finds his life turned upside down when millions of strangers suddenly start seeing him in their dreams. However, when his nighttime appearances take a nightmarish turn, he's forced to navigate the consequences of his newfound stardom.

programme.title: Wilson, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: After reuniting with his ex-wife (Laura Dern), a lonely and neurotic misanthrope (Woody Harrelson) tries to form a connection with the teenage daughter (Isabella Amara) he never knew he had.

programme.title: Big Miracle, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: A reporter (John Krasinski) in small-town Alaska and his former lover (Drew Barrymore), an environmentalist, try to form an international coalition to rescue three ice-trapped whales.

programme.title: Big Miracle, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: A reporter (John Krasinski) in small-town Alaska and his former lover (Drew Barrymore), an environmentalist, try to form an international coalition to rescue three ice-trapped whales.

programme.title: American Ultra, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When his secret past comes back to haunt him, a small-town stoner (Jesse Eisenberg) must use his latent, deadly skills to prevent the CIA from taking him out.

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two hard-partying brothers (Zac Efron, Adam Devine) bring two wild and uncontrollable women to their sister's (Sugar Lyn Beard) wedding in Hawaii.

programme.title: Vampires Suck, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: In a spoof of "Twilight" and other films, a pale vampire and a muscular werewolf try to win the heart of a beautiful teen.

programme.title: Low Tide, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: When teenager Alan and his younger brother find a bag of gold coins in a dead man's island home, they try to hide it from their friends -- but one of them, suspicious and violently unpredictable, is willing to do anything to get the money.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla, (1974, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An Okinawan monster-god helps Godzilla defeat his bionic double.

programme.title: Good Hair, (2009, Documentary)
programme.desc: Comic Chris Rock explores how hairstyles affect the self-esteem, activities and relationships of African-Americans.

programme.title: Batman and Superman: Battle of the Super Sons, (2022, Animated)
programme.desc: On his birthday, Jonathan Kent learns his dad is Superman and that he has superpowers of his own. He also meets Damian Wayne. The two boys are forced to team up to protect their loved ones from a hostile alien force.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The resourceful detective (Robert Downey Jr.) and his astute partner, Dr. Watson (Jude Law), meet a powerful criminal, a devotee of black magic who arises from his grave.

programme.title: Logan, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: In the near future, a weary Logan (Hugh Jackman) cares for an ailing Professor X (Patrick Stewart) while protecting a young mutant girl (Dafne Keen) from the dark forces that want to capture her.

programme.title: Blue Beetle, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Jaime Reyes finds himself in possession of an ancient relic of alien biotechnology called the Scarab. When the Scarab chooses Jaime to be its symbiotic host, he's bestowed with a suit of armor that's capable of extraordinary and unpredictable powers.

programme.title: House Party, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Aspiring club promoters and best buds Damon and Kevin need a huge windfall to make their problems go away. They decide to host the party of the year at an exclusive mansion, which just happens to belong to none other than NBA superstar LeBron James.

programme.title: Lady Bird, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: A teenager (Saoirse Ronan) navigates a loving but turbulent relationship with her strong-willed mother (Laurie Metcalf) over the course of an eventful and poignant senior year of high school.

programme.title: Big Miracle, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: A reporter (John Krasinski) in small-town Alaska and his former lover (Drew Barrymore), an environmentalist, try to form an international coalition to rescue three ice-trapped whales.

programme.title: Table 19, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dumped by the best man (Wyatt Russell), an ex-maid of honor (Anna Kendrick) must sit with a group of strangers (Craig Robinson, Lisa Kudrow) during her friend's wedding reception.

programme.title: Table 19, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dumped by the best man (Wyatt Russell), an ex-maid of honor (Anna Kendrick) must sit with a group of strangers (Craig Robinson, Lisa Kudrow) during her friend's wedding reception.

programme.title: Cut Bank, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Things go from bad to worse when a murder witness (Liam Hemsworth) in small-town Montana tries to leverage the crime into a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: It Follows, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: Following a strange sexual encounter, a teenager (Maika Monroe) has disturbing visions and the inescapable feeling that someone -- or something -- is stalking her.

programme.title: Teen Spirit, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: A shy teenager dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

programme.title: Invictus, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Following the fall of apartheid, Nelson Mandela (Morgan Freeman) tries to unite his countrymen by supporting the South African rugby team's underdog bid for the 1995 World Cup Championship.

programme.title: Nine Lives, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: A workaholic billionaire (Kevin Spacey) tries to communicate with his family when a bizarre turn of events traps him inside the body of a cat named Mr. Fuzzypants.

programme.title: Spaceship Earth, (2020, Documentary)
programme.desc: In 1991 eight visionaries embark on a two-year experiment to quarantine themselves inside Biosphere 2 -- a self-engineered replica of Earth's ecosystem.

programme.title: Home Again, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: Separated from her husband, Alice lets three young men -- Harry, George and Teddy -- stay in her guesthouse. As Alice develops a budding romance with Harry, her newfound happiness comes crashing down when her ex shows up with a suitcase in his hand.

programme.title: Confidence, (2003, Crime Story)
programme.desc: A con man (Edward Burns) and his crew swindle a gangster's accountant, then try to repay him by stealing from a crooked banker.

programme.title: Skin, (2019, Documentary)
programme.desc: Nollywood actress Beverly Naya explores Black beauty and the practice of skin bleaching in African culture.

programme.title: It Comes at Night, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: Sergio Leone: The Italian Who Invented America, (2022, Documentary)
programme.desc: An homage to Italian film director Sergio Leone, credited as the pioneer of the spaghetti western subgenre, featuring interviews with Quentin Tarantino, Robert De Niro and Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan, (2016, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan (Alexander SkarsgÃ¥rd) must return to the jungle to save his captive wife (Margot Robbie) from King Leopold's devious envoy (Christoph Waltz).

programme.title: Almost Christmas, (2016, Christmas)
programme.desc: A beloved patriarch asks his family members for one gift this holiday season: to get along. If they can honor that wish and spend five days under the same roof without killing one another, it will be a Christmas miracle.

programme.title: Gone With the Wind, (1939, Romance)
programme.desc: Presented as originally released in 1939. Includes themes and character depictions which may be offensive and problematic to contemporary audiences. A Southern belle struggles to return her family's estate to its original glory after the Civil War.

programme.title: Gone With the Wind, (1939, Romance)
programme.desc: Presented as originally released in 1939. Includes themes and character depictions which may be offensive and problematic to contemporary audiences. A Southern belle struggles to return her family's estate to its original glory after the Civil War.

programme.title: The Secrets We Keep, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: In post-World War II America, a woman, rebuilding her life in the suburbs with her husband, kidnaps her neighbor and seeks vengeance for the heinous war crimes she believes he committed against her.

programme.title: Vampires Suck, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: In a spoof of "Twilight" and other films, a pale vampire and a muscular werewolf try to win the heart of a beautiful teen.

programme.title: Veronica Mars, (2014, Mystery)
programme.desc: On the eve of her law-school graduation, Veronica turns amateur sleuth once again after ex-boyfriend, Logan, becomes a murder suspect.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: A lieutenant general (Alan Rickman) and a colonel (Helen Mirren) face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victim's daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: Scream 3, (2000, Horror)
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: A Cure for Wellness, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: After traveling to a remote location in the Swiss Alps, a Wall Street stockbroker (Dane DeHaan) unravels the terrifying secrets of a mysterious spa where guests never leave.

programme.title: Blood Father, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: An ex-convict (Mel Gibson) and his estranged daughter (Erin Moriarty) go on the run from her drug-dealing boyfriend (Diego Luna) and his vicious cartel.

programme.title: The Accountant, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Treasury agent (J.K. Simmons) closes in on a brilliant freelance accountant (Ben Affleck) who works for dangerous criminal organizations.

programme.title: The Fire Inside, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: The story of Claressa "T-Rex" Shields, a boxer from Flint, Mich., who trained to become the first woman in her country's history to win an Olympic gold medal in the sport.

programme.title: Hello, My Name Is Doris, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: With help from her best friend's (Tyne Daly) granddaughter (Isabella Acres), a smitten woman (Sally Field) concocts schemes to get the attention of a younger co-worker (Max Greenfield) in her office.

programme.title: At Close Range, (1986, Crime Story)
programme.desc: A rural teen (Sean Penn) joins his father's (Christopher Walken) crime clan and winds up running for his life with his girlfriend (Mary Stuart Masterson).

programme.title: There's Something Wrong With the Children, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Margaret and Ben take a weekend trip with two longtime friends and their two young children. Ben soon suspects something sinister is afoot when the kids start behaving strangely after disappearing into the woods overnight.

programme.title: The Dogs of War, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Jamie, a mercenary, is hired by a large corporation to help liberate Zangaro, a small African nation, from an iron-fisted despot. Once there, Jamie learns more about the plight of the country's people and joins the Zangaro people's fight.

programme.title: Missing in Action, (1984, War)
programme.desc: A U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) escapes from the Viet Cong, then comes back with a floating arsenal to get others out.

programme.title: Missing in Action 2: The Beginning, (1985, War)
programme.desc: An imprisoned U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) fights the military overlord (Oh Soon-tek) of a slave-labor opium operation in Vietnam.

programme.title: Braddock: Missing in Action III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: A U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) returns to Vietnam and fights his way out with his wife, son (Roland Harrah III) and Amerasian orphans.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke Ellis wakes up at The Institute, a facility that abducts teenagers with psychic powers; Ms. Sigsby, the place's charismatic director, claims they're saving the world; Tim Jamieson hides from his haunted past as a small-town night knocker.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke bonds with the other Front Half residents and begins plotting his escape; Ms. Sigsby manages the fallout from a security breach; in town, Tim begins to look into The Institute, only to find himself caught up in a high-stakes standoff.

programme.title: From Russia With Love, (1963, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Sean Connery) lands in Istanbul with a Russian beauty (Daniela Bianchi), a pawn in SPECTRE's plot to kill him.

programme.title: GoldenEye, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: A secret weapon's theft sends Agent 007 (Pierce Brosnan) to Russia, where a pretty computer programmer (Izabella Scorupco) helps him track an ex-cohort (Sean Bean) believed dead.

programme.title: Octopussy, (1983, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Roger Moore) links a fake Faberge egg to smugglers (Maud Adams, Louis Jourdan) in league with a mad Soviet general.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke Ellis wakes up at The Institute, a facility that abducts teenagers with psychic powers; Ms. Sigsby, the place's charismatic director, claims they're saving the world; Tim Jamieson hides from his haunted past as a small-town night knocker.

programme.title: American Refugee, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: With the American economy in collapse and the nation under martial law, a family seeks shelter in their neighbor's bunker, where the danger inside is potentially greater than the danger outside.

programme.title: The Return of the Living Dead, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: Punk rockers, a cremator (Don Calfa) and medical-supply workers (Clu Gulager, James Karen) have a problem with zombies in Kentucky.

programme.title: The Return of the Living Dead, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: Punk rockers, a cremator (Don Calfa) and medical-supply workers (Clu Gulager, James Karen) have a problem with zombies in Kentucky.

programme.title: The Perfect Match, (2016, Romance)
programme.desc: Complications arise when a lifelong playboy (Terrence J) bets his friends that he can date the same woman (Cassie Ventura) for one month without falling in love.

programme.title: Bad News Bears, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: A single mother (Marcia Gay Harden) recruits a former baseball player (Billy Bob Thornton) to coach a ragtag team of misfit Little Leaguers.

programme.title: IF, (2024, Family)
programme.desc: After discovering she can see everyone's imaginary friends, a girl embarks on a magical adventure to reconnect forgotten IFs with their kids.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Four unlikely terrapin warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April O'Neil (Megan Fox) to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A scientist (Guy Pearce) travels into the future and meets a race of people who fear hideous monsters living under the ground.

programme.title: WarGames, (1983, Thriller)
programme.desc: A teen taps his computer into the NORAD missile-defense system and plays a video game, "Global Thermonuclear War.".

programme.title: Species, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A scientist (Ben Kingsley) leads the hunt for a genetically engineered creature who morphs into a human blonde and tries to reproduce in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Transformers, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

programme.title: The Matrix, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: An ex-cop doing prison time chases a virtual-reality killer from the program onto the Los Angeles streets.

programme.title: Torn Hearts, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: A country music duo seek out the private mansion of their idol and end up in a twisted series of horrors that force them to confront the limits they'd go for their dreams.

programme.title: Torn Hearts, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: A country music duo seek out the private mansion of their idol and end up in a twisted series of horrors that force them to confront the limits they'd go for their dreams.

programme.title: Revenge of the Pink Panther, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) tracks a French drug kingpin with the help of disguises and his quarry's ex-mistress (Dyan Cannon).

programme.title: Happy Birthday!, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: When two friends embark on a journey to the seediest parts of Mexicali for a birthday celebration, they quickly realize their trip has taken a dangerous turn that involves sex, drugs, torture and a ransom involving the Mexican cartel.

programme.title: Geronimo: An American Legend, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: An American legend comes to life in this epic Western starring Jason Patric, Robert Duvall, Gene Hackman and Wes Studi as Geronimo, giving a stunning performance as the fearless warrior who was the last Indian leader to surrender to the white man.

programme.title: The Quick and the Dead, (1995, Western)
programme.desc: In this edgy and darkly humorous Western, a mysterious young woman rides into the lawless town of Redemption to settle an old score that has haunted her since she was a child. She becomes swept up in a deadly quick-draw tournament. Rated: R

programme.title: Payback, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: After a successful heist, Porter is left for dead. Once he recovers, he seeks vengeance and wants his share of the money.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: The Quick and the Dead, (1995, Western)
programme.desc: In this edgy and darkly humorous Western, a mysterious young woman rides into the lawless town of Redemption to settle an old score that has haunted her since she was a child. She becomes swept up in a deadly quick-draw tournament. Rated: R

programme.title: Primal Fear, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Courtroom thriller about a slick, hotshot lawyer (Richard Gere) who takes the seemingly unwinnable case of a young altar boy (Edward Norton) accused of murdering an eminent catholic priest.

programme.title: The Firm, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: Mitch joins a prosperous Memphis firm that affords Mitch and his wife an affluent lifestyle beyond their wildest dreams. But when FBI agents confront him with evidence of corruption and murder within the firm, Mitch sets out to find the truth.

programme.title: A Few Good Men, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as a brash Navy lawyer who's teamed with a gung-ho litigator (Demi Moore) in a politically explosive murder case, defending two Marines accused of killing a fellow soldier

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Love And Bullets, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: The FBI sends a loner (Charles Bronson) to kidnap a mobster's mistress in Switzerland.

programme.title: White Lightning, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: In one of his most memorable roles, Burt Reynolds portrays a moonshine whiskey runner who turns state's witness to avenge the murder of a boy no one understood.

programme.title: The Great Train Robbery, (1978, Action)
programme.desc: Sean Connery, Donald Sutherland and Lesley-Anne Down star in this true-life action thriller, based on director/screenwriter Michael Crichton's best-selling novel, about a daring gold heist that shocked Victorian society.

programme.title: Don't Look Now, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: On a trip to Venice, a young couple whose daughter has just died meet a psychic who leads them into a frightening and suspenseful experience. Based on a novel by Daphne Du Maurier.

programme.title: The Day Of The Locust, (1975, Drama)
programme.desc: An art director in the 1930s falls in love and attempts to make a young woman an actress despite Hollywood who wants nothing to do with her because of her problems with an estranged man and her alcoholic father.

programme.title: Ace and Sabo race to rescue Luffy from the clutches of a murderous gang of pirates! Sabo wants to grab Luffy and make a break for it, but Ace refuses to back down from a fight â even when he's outnumbered!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I WON'T RUN! ACE'S DESPERATE RESCUE OPERATION!

programme.title: When a nobleman recognizes Sabo in the streets, Luffy and Ace learn the painful secret of their friend's past. As a sign of solidarity, the three boys pledge to become pirates and hoist a toast to brotherhood!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE SEA SOMEDAY! THE PLEDGE OF THE THREE BRATS!

programme.title: After another beating from Garp, Luffy and his friends take to the jungle and build a pirate hideout at the top of an enormous tree. First order of business: booby trap the new place!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LEAVING THE DADAN FAMILY FOR GOOD?! THE KIDS' HIDEOUT HAS BEEN BUILT!

programme.title: Luffy and his friends vow to defeat the giant tiger that's been stealing their food. Ace gets angry when his father's identity is revealed. Sabo's parents hire pirates to track down their son!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY BECOMING AN APPRENTICE?! A MAN WHO FOUGHT AGAINST THE KING OF THE PIRATES!

programme.title: Luffy, Ace, and Sabo take pirate lessons from a mysterious old scallywag who just might know the secret to defeat the big tiger â and becoming a good captain!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE AGAINST THE BIG TIGER! WHO IS GOING TO BE CAPTAIN?!

programme.title: The brothers are captured by a gang of pirates, and Sabo is handed over to his noble father, where the boy quickly discovers a sinister plot to destroy Gray Terminal forever!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FREEDOM TAKEN AWAY! THE NOBLES' PLOT CLOSING IN ON THE BROTHERS!

programme.title: While flames spread across Gray Terminal, Sabo makes a desperate attempt to escape the trappings of his noble birth and save his brothers. Meanwhile, Luffy and Ace must fight to avoid an untimely end!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIRE HAS BEEN SET! THE GRAY TERMINAL IN CRISIS!

programme.title: Luffy is spared from a fiery death by an unlikely rescuer, but Ace refuses to leave Gray Terminal until he settles the score with Bluejam. Meanwhile, Sabo makes waves with a last-ditch escape attempt!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: WHERE CAN FREEDOM BE FOUND? A SAD DEPARTURE OF A BOY!

programme.title: Luffy and Ace receive troubling reports of a Celestial attack on Sabo's ship. Ace is eager to seek out the responsible parties and exact revenge, but a letter from his absent brother tempers his eagerness to fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TAKE GOOD CARE OF HIM! A LETTER FROM THE BROTHER!

programme.title: In the wake of Sabo's death, Luffy and Ace grow stronger than ever by continuing their daily routine of nonstop fighting. As the years pass, each brother prepares to set sail in search of future adventures!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO LIVE UP TO THE PROMISE! DEPARTURES OF THEIR OWN!

programme.title: Garp takes a beating from a heartbroken mountain bandit, and a big blue friend helps Luffy drown his despair in the newfound desire to reunite with his mates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I WANT TO SEE THEM! LUFFY'S MOURNFUL CRY!

programme.title: One by one, the Straw Hats are crushed to learn the tragic fate of Fire Fist Ace. Despite their own unique problems, the crew members' thoughts immediately turn to their crestfallen captain.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: STRAW HATS IN SHOCK! THE BAD NEWS HAS REACHED THEM!

programme.title: Luffy is determined to reassemble his scattered crew, but a powerful old friend forces him to rethink his plans. Meanwhile, Usopp fights to escape an island that wants to have him for lunch!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: REUNITED WITH DARK KING RAYLEIGH! DECISION TIME FOR LUFFY!

programme.title: Desperate to reach Luffy, Nami risks her life to escape from an island of weather wizards. Meanwhile, Franky rides a carbonation high through the ice and snow in search of a seaworthy vessel!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BACK TO OUR CAPTAIN! A JAIL BREAK AT THE SKY ISLAND AND THE INCIDENT ON THE WINTER ISLAND!

programme.title: Zoro's escape attempt is thwarted by a gang of sword-slinging baboon bullies. Brook uses music to end a feud between irate islanders with unequal arms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ENCOUNTER! THE GREAT SWORDSMAN MIHAWK! ZORO'S SELF-WILLED DEADLY STRUGGLE!

programme.title: Chopper hitches a ride on a giant bird, Luffy makes a shocking return to Marineford, and Sanji finds himself fighting the most beautiful man he's ever seen!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DISASTER FOR SANJI! THE QUEEN'S RETURN TO THE KINGDOM!

programme.title: Luffy along with Jimbei and Dark King Rayleigh, cause quite the commotion upon their return to Marineford. Meanwhile, powerful pirates all across the globe wreak havoc on the innocent!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy hopes to send a message to his mates by way of a clue hidden in a newspaper article. Meanwhile, the Flying Fish Riders protect the Straw Hat's ship from scandalous scavengers!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: WITH HOPES IT WILL REACH MY FRIENDS! BIG NEWS SPREADING FAST!

programme.title: Trafalgar Law waits for the right moment to make his move, Blackbeard is pursued by powerful marines, and Chopper makes a surprising return to the land of gargantuan birds!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: PIRATES GET ON THE MOVE! ASTOUNDING NEW WORLD!

programme.title: Nami uses her feminine charms to learn about the New World weather. Franky moves into Dr. Vegapunk's laboratory, and Sanji must fight to stay out of a cute dress!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LIVING THROUGH HELL! SANJI'S FIGHT FOR HIS MANHOOD!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue preparations for their voyage to the New World as Robin heads for a meeting with the Revolutionary Dragon. Usopp aspires to become King of the Snipers, and Zoro begs his mortal enemy to train him!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I WILL GET MUCH, MUCH STRONGER! ZORO'S PLEDGE TO HIS CAPTAIN!

programme.title: Dark King Rayleigh takes Luffy to a deadly, deserted island for two years of intense battle training! If the Straw Hat captain wants to survive in the New World, he'll have to hone his hidden powers!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S TRAINING BEGINS! TO THE PLACE WE PROMISED IN 2 YEARS!

programme.title: After two years of rigorous training, the new and improved Straw Hats make their way to Sabaody Archipelago, but their long-awaited reunion is spoiled by a villainous gang of imposters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BEGINNING OF THE NEW CHAPTER! THE STRAW HATS REUNITED!

programme.title: Luffy picks a fight with himself, Chopper falls in with a dubious crowd of imitation pirates, and Zorro causes a commotion when he falls asleep on the wrong ship!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AN EXPLOSIVE SITUATION! LUFFY VS. FAKE LUFFY!

programme.title: Chopper struggles to make sense of the changes his "friends" have undergone in the last two years, and the Navy mobilizes in an attempt to stop the pirate posers. Will the real Straw Hats please stand up?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE NAVY HAS SET OUT! THE STRAW HATS IN DANGER!

programme.title: Chopper and Usopp flip over Franky's new body, Brook must choose between rock-n-roll stardom and the life of a pirate, and Luffy wanders into a very dangerous crowd!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BIG GUNS ASSEMBLED! THE DANGER OF THE FAKE STRAW HATS!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats prepare to set sail, Luffy gets a chance to show off his new powers in a brutal throw down between notorious pirates, navy soldiers, and deadly Pacifistas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE IS ON! SHOW THEM WHAT YOU GOT FROM TRAINING!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew are finally reunited, but before they can set sail, they'll need help from Dark King Rayleigh, Boa Hancock, and all the friends they've made in the last two years!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVERYONE TOGETHER! LUFFY, SETTING OUT FOR THE NEW WORLD!

programme.title: As word of the Straw Hat resurrection spreads through the Navy, Luffy and his crew get acclimated to their underwater environment, and Franky reveals the startling identity of the man who protected their ship!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SURPRISING FACT! THE MAN WHO GUARDED THE SUNNY!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are attacked by a rival gang of pirates, but that may be the least of their worries. Luffy and his crew are on a collision course with a cantankerous Kraken!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: DEADLY COMBAT UNDER THE SEA! THE DEMON OF THE OCEAN STRIKES!

programme.title: After their quarrel with the Kraken, the Straw Hats find themselves in hot water as Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji turn up missing, and the rest of the crew runs short on air!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LOST IN THE DEEP SEA! THE STRAW HATS GET SEPARATED!

programme.title: Thanks to a little help from a friend, Luffy saves his mates from a ghost ship captained by a deranged Dutchman! Unfortunately, their happy reunion is cut short by a volcanic eruption! Can the Hats take the heat?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: UNDERSEA VOLCANIC ERUPTION! DRIFTING TO THE FISHMAN ISLAND!

programme.title: The Straw Hats finally make it to Fish-Man Island, but their reputation precedes them, leading to trouble with the New Fish-Man Pirates! Only a daring maneuver can get them out of hot water, but there's no guarantee they'll survive!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LANDING AT THE FISHMAN ISLAND! BEAUTIFUL MERMAIDS!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shinpei Mayama, the Rat Clan, Union Mama... the all-stars of assassination, from all over the world, suddenly come after Lupin. They're players in a new game started by the executives of Marco Polo: Happy Deathday.
programme.sub-title: The Killers Gather in the Wasteland

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko smiles deviously as she points her gun at Lupin, when Zenigata arrives to save him and Ami. They get into the inspector's car which takes off, but it's soon attacked by soldiers who are trying to cash in the price on Lupin's head.
programme.sub-title: Zenigata's Pride and the Desert Dust

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot in the head by a drone fighter. With the death of its target, the Lupin Game is concluded. Time passes, and people forget about the game. Released from his duty of hunting Lupin, Ami now lives with Zenigata, when one day Goemon visits her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: The "Smart Safe" has come to the Greater Tokyo Bank. Lupin is goaded by Fujiko and Jigen to try and crack the technological wonder. What can he do against this peculiarly secure safe?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is hired by Gaston to retrieve a painting, and manages to do so easily enough... except the painting has a strange resemblance to a real Picasso piece, forcing Lupin to examine the truth behind why he was hired.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin visits Gaston's grave. There he meets the elderly Camille, with who he goes out for a drink when the pub's phone begins to ring. On the other end of the line is the supposedly dead Gaston.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot, and Albert gets his hands on the notebook. Lupin is saved by Jigen and Goemon and manages to survive his injuries under care. He then explains his past with Albert and how they know each other.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: After learning the shocking truth about Jose's terrifying plot, Lupin heads to Jose's headquarters with Albert, his old thieving comrade. Jigen and Goemon fight off the heaviest opposition while Lupin and Albert head into the heart of the enemy territory.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: To steal the fortune of the Drug King Pablo, the gang heads to South America with Fujiko. As Fujiko distracts the target, Lupin picks off the remains of Pablo's guards while making his way through the jungle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: In a rural town in France, full of cosplayers. Within the town celebrating a pop-cultural event is Goemon. Next to the inn, he decides to keep watch at is ChloÃ©'s Bistro. ChloÃ© is exactly the woman Goemon was looking for Lupin's current target.
programme.sub-title: The Extravagance of Goemon Ishikawa XIII

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Having enrolled at the Annecy School for Girls, Ami encounters a strange girl in the garden who aims her bow at a crow. The girl is Dolma, the princess of the Kingdom of Padar. Having no friends, Ami finds herself opening up to the odd Dolma.
programme.sub-title: The Bow, The Princess, and the Terrorist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Princess Dolma, please save Padar." With that request, Dolma is taken home. Lupin follows shortly, and Ami decides to accompany Fujiko to Padar in order to save Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is pierced by Dolma's arrow. Ami and Fujiko take Lupin and escape, hiding in a deserted building. The three of them decide to flee, with Lupin badly injured.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Padar sinks into chaos because of the civil war, but things take a sudden turn when the Shake Hands company gets involved. A proclamation by the king is posted online, proving him to be alive.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shortly after moving into the hideout in Riquewihr, Lupin wakes up to a broken bathroom. After bickering with Jigen for access to the bathroom, Fujiko appears.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A string of indiscriminate shootings has struck Northern Africa. They're actually a challenge to Lupin from the wealthy Zylberstein.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's gang visits the Northern Angel, on the outskirts of Russia. What at first seems like a snowy, dull town turns out to be full of riches to the joy of the group of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Peoplelog"--a social media service that uses AI to analyze the incredible amount of data on the internet, allowing you to learn all about a person.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko has been captured. She's being held at Orig Island, the headquarters of Shake Hands. Lupin and the gang, including Ami, head there to find her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Papa! Save Lupin!" Ami is reunited with her long-last father. But Enzo is already obsessed with using Peoplelog to save the world.
programme.sub-title: Just Then, An Old Buddy Said Something

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin III has vanished from the internet. Meanwhile, the man himself is updating Peoplelog with confidential information that begins to throw the world into chaos.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin receives an invitation to join a race by Mr. X. Jigen and Goemon questions Lupin's willingness to join despite knowing it's a trap, but Lupin has his eyes on the Golden Statue rumored to be in a mansion near the race course.
programme.sub-title: 50th Anniversary Special - Is Lupin Still Burning?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #17: Tactics Of Angels
programme.desc: Lupin faces his toughest opponents yet! Four women known as the Bloody Angels are after the strange metallic sphere he stole from Area 51. To get their hands on potential alien technology, they're willing to do anything.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #19: The Elusiveness of the Fog
programme.desc: Lupin's attempt to steal a time machine causes a crazy mishap! Now stuck in ancient Japan, his team and Inspector Zenigata must join forces to get back to their own time. But notorious thief Lupin has enemies everywhere... and everywhen!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A war is going down between the Italian and Chinese Mafias, and Fujiko ends up in the middle of it. A mysterious bodyguard named Daisuke Jigen stands at the heart of the matter, but who knows whose side he's really on?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: She's always getting in trouble / But she may give you a square deal / She's always sharing everything / Except for every steal / Even a lowly samurai / Is quick to see the appeal / How do you solve a problem like Fujiko Mine?

programme.title: Robocop, (2014, Science fiction)

programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.desc: Though Prohibition agent Eliot Ness attempts to take Al Capone down, even his best efforts fail due to widespread corruption within the Windy Citys police force.

programme.desc: Nothing is as it seems when an undocumented Filipina immigrant takes a job as a caretaker for a terminally ill man in a lavsh home. She and her daughter soon become ensnared by a terrible secret that threatens to tear them apart.
